item.description:
Spring is in the Air! Although, some may still see lasting signs of winter, we can feel the warmer days upon us. It is a time of whenbees buzz, the sun shines longer each day and plants work their way through the soil. Spring is filled with a sense of bursting energy, a time of renewal, manifestation, and celebration.

What about your home? A good spring cleaning can do wonders for your personal energy; it can nourish and strengthen you. Are the windows still sealed tight, feeling cold, low in energy? If you still feel sluggish and low-energy after a long and maybe challenging winter, come join us as Guest speaker and Feng Shui Consultant Erin Plunkett introduces us to amazing tips for lifting our energy to a high level by clearing your home.

We will:
Be introduced to what Feng Shui is and is not;
Learn what Qi is and how it works in our Lives
Become acquainted with the BaGua - the areas of Life
Learn some of Feng Shui's Cures/Adjustments
Explore how Feng Shui and Law of Attraction support each other
E = MC2   Einstein Everything is Energy
Thought = Energy  =  Creates our experiences/surroundings
Items, colors, clutter  =  Energy Vibration:  High or Low
Intentions = Thoughts = Energy Vibrations = Manifestation

“The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step” - Lao Tzu

This has been Erin' s Life, taking 1 step at a time to bring her full circle from her early years to the Love of Organizing and anything Chinese.

Erin recalls two predominant memories, the 1st memory being in her so called disastrous bedroom. So much so, that her Mother gave away her spare twin bed so that she would be unable to pile items on it!

Later she went off to college and moved into a dorm room that was designed to house 2 young adults. However, due to a shortage of rooms, there were 3 student sharing a small room; that was the beginning of the Transformation in her Life. It created “a drive” within to look for ways to streamline and organize Spaces.  It became - A Passion.

Erin's 2nd memory was her fascination and Love of reading Chinese Historical Fiction, which she can never seem to get enough of it. In her early 20’s, Erin became friends with several families of Chinese heritage. This gave her the wonderful opportunity to work for one of families part-time for several years.

Her Journey led her away from Virginia, however she will always remember her Chinese friend's parting “wisdom” about the placement of furniture and other items in the home.

Today Life’s Journey has brought Erin many moves, yet this wisdom continues to serve her well whenever possible. She is certified in the Wisdom of Feng Shui and how it applies in Homes and Business Environments.

Xie Xie  人物：谢,
( Thank You in Chinese ),
With Gratitude,

Erin Plunkett,AIOP, CFSP, HOA
Space Clearing Design Solutions
603.674.9222
Erin@SpaceClearingDesignSolutions.com
www.SpaceClearingDesignSolutions.com
https://www.facebook.com/SpaceClearingDesignSolutions

Free yourself from Physical, Mental & Emotional Clutter & Bring much more ENERGY into your Life.

Please call me if this your first time joining us.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
